attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is secretly invading your privacy. Trump and his team use the app to listen to your conversations and it can detect your location. Worse of all is even if close your app, everything that you do on your phone is being monitored. BE CAREFUL AND BE SAFE.

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible
attributes.review: App kept lagging and getting stuck on the pages I had to close and reopen the app everytime I wanted to get on. The image quality is also very terrible no good very bad. Would not recommend

attributes.title: Needs a lot of improvements
attributes.review: I didn't have the best experience on this app u should really think about changing it. Like everything about it. It was kind of odd to see a deformed cheeto puff when i opened the app too....

attributes.title: Would return in full Karen mode if I could.
attributes.review: This app is awful. Misinformation left and right, manipulative, and targeted. I hate to think about the poor innocent souls who find themselves succumbing to the false information shared on this platform. Do better.

attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: I figured it would be a pretty decent app since donald has all the money he could ever need, however, the app has been very glitchy and crashes most of the times I open it

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: It took forever to download even tho its not a large app I’m so disappointed in the looks when you open it it needs to be taken down and it keeps on crashing

attributes.title: My life Is gone
attributes.review: Before I got this everything was fine but when I got everything started glitching it keep sending tru.. I mean it send me a... a trump photo i was scared out of my life don’t get this app for your own safety I might have to go the hospital DON’T GET THIS APP I

attributes.title: This app needs to be deleted!!!
attributes.review: This app makes my phone glitch and trumps face popped up and scared the heck out of me and made me drop my phone and crack my screen all up this app brings nothing but evil. I’m sure there are others that agree with me 😁

attributes.title: Can’t believe anyone would download this app!!!
attributes.review: This app is the absolute worst thing I have ever put on my phone. Besides the fact that it is practically a virus, it won’t let me burn a how Minecraft village. Now this is just poor design. Do better trump,!

attributes.title: just disgusting🤢!!
attributes.review: this app wanted me to vote for it for president and may i say i was speechless like utterly stuck. it acted like it wasn’t sexist, racist, and ugly 🖐🏾. i feel as thought this app comes to mcdonald’s orders a big mac asks for no pickles, gets their food see there is no pickles, asks for the manager and then proceeds to scream at the manager for not putting pickles in their big mac and when asked to leave start recording and hollering that they are being harassed😐. but anyways y’all want sum from mcdonald’s ?👁👄👁
